name: NightDares
description:
You're deep  in the middle of a dark forest, with only a fire and stick to keep you safe and warm. Bring friends along if you wish. Dare to wander the forest, clear it if you will, light more fires, if that keeps you safe. What role do you play in the truth of the game.

Created at the 2018 MoJam Game Jam in Montreal. An early test for a massively multiplayer experience.  A great team, enjoying the weekend. More to come from Night Light games!
